description:
这周末就要举行四六级口语考试啦，不管是四级还是六级，都少不了自我介绍这一环节，今天我们就为大家讲解四六级口语考试的重要题型--自我介绍！~

首先自我介绍本来就是见仁见智，建议大家在20秒内简单讲出自己的特色。注意不要啰嗦，因为四六级是机考，时间只有20秒，一旦超时，系统便会自动切断。

自我介绍有以下几个重点：

1. Your name

2. Your grade/major

3. Your hometown

3. Your personality

4. Your likes and dislikes

模板一

My name is _____(中文名) or _____(外文名). I am a freshman/ sophomore/ junior/ senior in______(学校名). I am a/an _____(性格) person with a cheerful attitude. I study____(专业) and I would like to be a _____(梦想) in the future. I am more than happy to be here and I wish everyone good luck today.

详解：

1. 中文名/外文名：My name is _____ or _____显得简洁，比my Chinese name is _____; my English name is _____清新脱俗太多了。

2. 大一：freshman；大二：sophomore；大三：junior；大四：senior；大五：year-5 student；研究生：graduate student；博士生：Ph.D. candidate

3. 性格：备选词down-to-earth; easy-going; hard-working; ambitious; quite 等

4. 专业/梦想：填写专业和职业，比如chemistry/scientist; accounting/accountant;

medical science/doctor; art/painter; finance/quant; computer science/data analyst

5. 祝福：起到缓冲作用，如果前面不流畅或忘词，或者学校专业名字较长，最后一句可说可不说，也可以只说一半。

建议：一定要熟读背诵，考场20s，如果觉得时间较紧张，可以减少的部分是：英文名、学校名或最后一句祝福。

模板二

My name is _____(中文名) or _____(外文名). I am a freshman/ sophomore/ junior/ senior in______(学校名). I come from ______(家乡), which is a tourist city. I am particularly interested in _______(爱好) and __________(补充). I will try my best in the test today.

详解：

1. 中文名/外文名：同上

2.家乡：后面可以替换

Hangzhou, which is a tourist city.

Luoyang, which is an ancient city.

Shanghai, which is a modern city.

Chongqing, where hot pot is originated.

Chengdu, which is a city of entertainment.

3. 爱好/补充：填写爱好和说明，句式也可以灵活使用。如：

I am particularly interested in soccer, and my favorite team is Manchester United.

I am crazy about classical music, and my favorite composer is Bach.

I am addicted to computer games, and my favorite game is War craft.

I am interested in body-building, and now I have six-pack.

I am a huge fan of travelling, and I have been to 20 cities in China.

4. 祝福：I will try my best …照样起到缓冲。
